title: Bobby Texts Jason Aldean About His Dog Stroller + Raymundo Pitches His Business Idea To Barbara Corcoran Of 'Shark Tank' + Draft: Favorite Things To Eat With A Spoon
itunes:title: Bobby Texts Jason Aldean About His Dog Stroller + Raymundo Pitches His Business Idea To Barbara Corcoran Of 'Shark Tank' + Draft: Favorite Things To Eat With A Spoon
description:
Amy saw a picture of Jason Aldean and his wife with their dog in a stroller. Bobby’s girlfriend has been wanting one for their dog Stanley, so Bobby text Jason during the show and got a funny response. We talk 'behind the scenes' stuff with Barbara Corcoran of 'Shark Tank'. Plus, Raymundo gets to pitch his business idea! We also draft our favorite things to eat with a spoon!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
